overview: Michael Long joined GIV in 2001 as CFO, previously for many years he was CFO of Mid-Atlantic Venture Fund, a leading regional early-stage investment fund. During his 14-year venture capital career Mike has been involved with the formation of several private equity funds, as well as, several hundred portfolio transactions. In addition to his financial, accounting and administrative responsibilities Mike plays a key role in structuring and negotiating transactions, as well as, providing advisory services to portfolio companies.
